short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All hail our great leader Nicolas Cage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Periodically flash Nicolas Cage upon your browser (or someone else's browser) to remind you of his glory. This extension is not intended to be used as a prank by installing it on another's browser and scaring them with his glory. Furthermore, you definitely shouldn't hide the extension icon from the toolbar as to make it difficult to trace his glory.
